about_the_game:
The picture of café au lait

Introduction


The Picture of Café au lait is a visual novel game that makes the players feel immersed in the story and the characters. You will experience the story through the first-person perspective of the main character in the story named "Takagi".
This game allows the player to make decisions and has multiple endings. Your crucial choices will change the conclusion of the story.

Synopsis


This is the story of a 3rd high school student named "Takeomi Takagi", the only member remaining in the Art club because of his wrongdoings in the past. His goal is to win the art competition before his graduation from high school.
He meets “Itsuki Eimi”, the cheerful junior high school girl in the Basketball Club, because she ruins his painting that he will send to the competition by accidentally running into it.
This is the coming-of-age story and love story between two people who have opposite personalities. They both have their dreams and face their obstacles together.
“Takagi”, the strict and sharp-tongued yet kind senior who tries to help Eimi achieve her dreams to redeem himself from his past faults.
“Eimi”, the cheerful junior who always hides her sadness, wishes to become a full member of the basketball team.
Will they achieve their dreams or give up?
What future awaits them is for you to decide.

Main Characters


Itsuki Eimi


“I don’t want to lose to myself again and again. So, I will only move forward as you said”

The Heroine of the story.
Eimi is a 1st year high school student who has a cheerful personality. She often jokes around and likes to tease Takagi because of his overly strict personality. Her dream is to become a full member of the basketball team, even if her body is on the short side.
She is a joyful and determined girl who loves basketball, but she always hides her sadness behind her smile. Because of her kind personality, she decides to be Takagi's friend, who is lonely and often comes to the Art club room to meet him and makes him smile.

name: The Picture of Café au lait

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
